4. Heather Logan

Heather Logan
=============

![Heather Logan](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=10275)

Heather Logan, Position 1
-------------------------

[Email](mailto:heatherl@arlingtonwa.gov)

Term Information
----------------

Term expires December 31, 2025  
Elected January 1, 2022  
Appointed September 7, 2021

Occupation
----------

Communications Consultant

Family
------

Husband - Sid, daughters - Sophie and Claire

Hobbies
-------

Hiking, boating, genealogy, and time with family.

Affiliations/Associations
-------------------------

### Local

* Citizens for Arlington Schools, treasurer, 2020-2024
* City of Arlington Parks, Arts and Recreation Commission, 2019-2021
* City of Arlington, Citizens’ Salary Commission Chair, 2015 and 2021
* Arlington Dollars for Scholars, board member, 2013-2014
* Arlington Arts Council, Art Advocate of the Year, 2013
* Arlington-Smokey Point Chamber of Commerce, President, 2012.  Board member, 2007 - 2013
* Cascade Valley Hospital Foundation, board member, 2006 – 2020

### County

* Snohomish County Board of Health, 2023-present
* Snohomish County MAC group, 2017- present
* Snohomish County Mass Vaccination Program volunteer 2021
* Leadership Snohomish County Education Committee member, 2017-2021
* Housing Hope, North Region board member, 2011-2015

### Regional

* Institute for Systems Biology, Development Department volunteer, 2019-2021

### National

* University of Chicago, prospective student interviewer, 1990 - 2019

Education
---------

City University of Seattle, M.B.A., 2002   
University of Chicago, B.A., 1985

Other
-----

 "When you can be anything, start with kind."
